name: Ingres Utility Perl Modules
short_description: Ingres RDBMS Utility Perl Modules to interface with commands and utilities for local administration of Ingres database services, providing a framework to build tools to ease sysadmin tasks. These modules can be used with ease to automate admin tasks.
